amendment.description: An amendment numbered 70 printed in Part B of House Report 118-272 to reduce funding for the Student Aid Administration by $1,769,207,000, and transfer the savings to the Spending Reduction Account.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce the account for Student Aid Administration by $1,769,207,000, and apply the savings to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A027) Failed by recorded vote: 81 - 353 (Roll no. 655).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A027) Failed by recorded vote: 81 - 353 (Roll no. 655).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
